definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: A wreath was laid on the monument to a fanfare of trumpets.
sentences.chinese: 在响亮的号角声中花圈被献在纪念碑前。

sentences.english: Your feet should not slap loudly as they hit the ground.
sentences.chinese: 当触地时，您的脚不应该发出响亮的拍击声。

sentences.english: Round 1900 his repute was still untarnished .
sentences.chinese: 在1900年前后他的名声仍很响亮。

sentences.english: Listen carefully to every word you hear, then repeat them out loud.
sentences.chinese: 仔细地听清楚每一个单词，然后响亮地复述出来。

sentences.english: It is loudest at the apex and may be accentuated by placing the patient in the left lateral decubitus position.
sentences.chinese: 心尖部位最响亮，病人处左侧卧位时听得最清楚。

sentences.english: An hour later another song, loud and screechy, filled the room.
sentences.chinese: 一个小时后，房间里响起了另一首歌，响亮而刺耳。

sentences.english: The males make a loud croaking sound that can be heard during the night.
sentences.chinese: 其雄性蛙类会发出响亮的聒噪声，彻夜不息。

sentences.english: The accordion was in full blast in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 在大厅里手风琴拉得非常响亮。

sentences.english: He gave a loud whistle of surprise.
sentences.chinese: 他吹了一声响亮的口哨表示惊讶。

sentences.english: The Los Angeles to New Jersey footrace did not sound quite so appealing.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶到新泽西的长跑，叫起来就不那么响亮了。

sentences.english: Barbed these words, it was loudly stirring the eardrum.
sentences.chinese: 这些带刺的话语，响亮地激荡着耳鼓。

sentences.english: The sound of the exhaust jet was very loud, and undulated slightly.
sentences.chinese: 的声音，排气射流是非常响亮，并略有起伏。

sentences.english: Then "Boom!" The guitars and drums kick in loud and rockin’!
sentences.chinese: 低音的隆隆声很是响亮，吉他和鼓在响个不停。

sentences.english: The sound that squawked out of the little speaker that you attached to your car window was tinny at best.
sentences.chinese: 贴在车窗上的小音箱播出的声音也并不响亮。
她用响亮而深沉的声音答话。

sentences.english: The baby with the loudest howls is declared the winner by the sumo judge.
sentences.chinese: 哭声最响亮的婴儿被评委宣布为比赛冠军。

definition: sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 輕脆|轻脆
high-pitched and penetrating (musical instrument, voice etc)/high-spirited/fever-pitched (atmosphere)
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
